## type BuildOpts

```go
type BuildOpts struct {
    EnvVars    map[string]string
    BuildFlags []string
    Dir        string
    In         string
}
```

## type CrossBuildOpts

```go
type CrossBuildOpts struct {
    BuildOpts
    Platforms     []Platform
    OutFileFormat string
}
```

}

}
